summary: Build a NEET/JEE practice (quiz) platform with syllabus-based chapter organization and year-wise PYQ question banks, including user-friendly question navigation and session resume.
architectural_notes: Store per-user attempt state (e.g., current question index/slide) to enable resume across sessions/devices.

existing_features.title: Update the Practice page so students can jump to any question by clicking on a visible list/grid of question numbers (a question navigator), instead of only typing a number.

Ensure practice resume behavior reliably restores the student to the same question/slide they last viewed when they exit and later return to the same (subject, chapter, category), for both anonymous and authenticated users.
Add support for year-wise PYQ organization for NEET PYQ and JEE PYQ questions from year 2025 down to 2000, including backend data modeling and frontend year selection before starting PYQ practice.

new_feature_requests.summary: Allow students to jump/skip to any question by clicking its question number (question navigator).
Persist quiz progress so if a student exits and returns later, they resume at the same question/slide where they left off.
Add Physics, Chemistry, and Biology chapters based on the NEET syllabus.
Add a NEET/JEE PYQ section with questions organized year-wise from 2025 down to 2000 (populate using AI-assisted sourcing).
Populate the app with NEET-syllabus-based chapters for Physics, Chemistry, and Biology, and populate the NEET/JEE PYQ banks with year-tagged questions for years 2025–2000.

projectName: Add clickable question navigator, resume practice position, and seed NEET syllabus chapters + year-wise PYQ (2025–2000)
